availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac Jones and Ann Jones. Married to Altozory Linsey Jones in February 1858. Father of Martha J. Jones and William H. Jones. Resident of Todd County in 1850. Farmer in Todd County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 1, p. 202. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 41. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, Fairview Precinct, p. 38. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Marriages, Todd County, Kentucky, 1858.
